snippet: Jon and Charlene Simonian wanted to buy an apartment. They weren’t particular about neighborhood, but the property had to come in below $1,000 a square foot.
abstract: The Hunt column on search by Jon and Charlene Simonian, who wanted to buy an apartment in New York City; couple was not particular about neighborhood, but the property had to come in below $1,000 a square foot and finally purchased a three-bedroom at the northeast corner of Central Park near 110th Street for $1.525 million.
lead_paragraph: Jon and Charlene Simonian wanted to buy an apartment. They weren’t particular about neighborhood, but the property had to come in below $1,000 a square foot.
